title: ** User logs in to the system with valid credentials
preconditions: User is on the login page
User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User enters username and password into the respective fields.
System receives the input and checks the validity of the credentials against the database.
4. System verifies if the entered username and password match the stored credentials (tomsmith/SuperSecretPassword!).
5. If credentials are valid, the system displays a success message.
6. User is redirected to the secured area of the application.
a. System verifies that the entered username and password do not match the stored credentials.
b. System displays an error message.
c. User remains on the login page and can try again.
postconditions: User is either authenticated and redirected to the secured area or remains on the login page with an error message.
System logs the successful login event.
